content: प्रतिपादनं {@--1@} Giving, granting bestowing. {@--2@} Demonstrating, proving, establishing. {@--3@} Treating of, explaining, expounding, illustrating {@--4@} Effecting, accomplishing, fulfilment. {@--5@} Causing, producing. {@--6@} Repeated action, practice. {@--7@} Commencement. {@--8@} Giving back, restoring. {@--9@} Entrusting, appointing. {@--10@} Action, worldly conduct.
